1.text: And these are the sons of David, who were born to him in Hebron: the firstborn, Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jizreelitess; the second, Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess;

2.text: the third, Absalom the son of Maachah, daughter of Talmai king of Geshur; the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith;

3.text: the fifth, Shephatiah of Abital; the sixth, Ithream, of Eglah his wife:

4.text: six were born to him in Hebron. And there he reigned seven years and six months. And in Jerusalem he reigned thirty-three years.

5.text: And these were born to him in Jerusalem: Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bath-shua the daughter of Ammiel;

6.text: and Ibhar, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,

7.text: and Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

8.text: and Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine:

9.text: all were sons of David, besides the sons of the concubines; and Tamar was their sister.

10.text: And Solomonâ€™s son was Rehoboam; Abijah his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,

11.text: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,

12.text: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,

13.text: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,

14.text: Amon his son, Josiah his son.

15.text: And the sons of Josiah: the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.

16.text: And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.

17.text: And the sons of Jeconiah: Assir; Salathiel his son,

18.text: Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazzar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.

19.text: And the sons of Pedaiah were Zerubbabel and Shimei. And the sons of Zerubbabel: Meshullam and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister,

20.text: and Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, [and] Jushab-hesed, five.

21.text: And the sons of Hananiah: Pelatiah and Isaiah; the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.

22.text: And the sons of Shechaniah: Shemaiah; and the sons of Shemaiah: Hattush, and Jigeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.

23.text: And the sons of Neariah: Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.

24.text: And the sons of Elioenai: Hodaviah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Delaiah, and Anani, seven.
